text: Kpuere is a department or commune of Noumbiel Province in south-eastern Burkina Faso. Its capital lies at the town of Kpuere.Burkinabé government inforoute communale The 2 only other villages are Dianbile And Koanta == Administrative Subdivisions == The department of Kpuere is subdivided into 2 Subprefectures. {| class="wikitable" |+ !Subprefecture !Capital |- |Kpuere |Kpuere |- |Koulbi Yoraouetun |Koanta |} ==References== Category:Departments of Burkina Faso Category:Noumbiel Province
title: Kpuére Department
